CustomField.description: Field name for the 2nd street line part of the address. Will typically be a Text field. OPTIONAL (Usually, both lines can be included in the single "Street" field, use this field only if you want them separated.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field name for the 2nd street line part of the address. Will typically be a Text field. OPTIONAL (Usually, both lines can be included in the single "Street" field, use this field only if you want them separated.)
CustomField.label: Street2
